pdbeccdutils.utils¶

class pdbeccdutils.utils.flattening.FlatteningManager(generic_templates_path, pubchem_templates_path)¶

Toolkit for flattening ligand’s 3D structure using RDKit. One can supply either templates or 2D depictions by pubchem. Pubchem templates can be downloaded using PubChemDownloader class.

flaten_molecule(id, mol)¶

Given input molecule tries to generate its depictions.

Presently 3 methods are used:
Pubchem template - find 2d depiction in pubchem db User-provided templates - try to use generic templates From 3D conformer - just apply default RDKit functionality
Parameters:
  • id (str) – id of the ligand
  • mol (Chem.rdchem.Mol) – molecule to be flattened
Returns:

Information about flattened ligand or None if the flattening failed.
Return type:

FlatteningResult
class pdbeccdutils.utils.flattening.FlatteningResult(source, template_name, mol, score)¶
mol¶

Alias for field number 2

score¶

Alias for field number 3

source¶

Alias for field number 0

template_name¶

Alias for field number 1

class pdbeccdutils.utils.flattening.FlatteningValidator(mol)¶

Toolkit for estimation of flattening quality

count_bond_collisions()¶

Counts number of collisions among all bonds. Can be used for estimations of how ‘wrong’ the depiction is.

Returns:numer of bond collisions per molecule
Return type:int
count_suboptimal_atom_positions(lowerBound, upperBound)¶

Detects whether the structure has a pair or atoms in the range <lowerBound, upperBound> meaning that the flattening could be improved.

Parameters:
  • lowerBound (float) – lower bound
  • upperBound (float) – upper bound
Returns:

indication whether or not the atoms are not in optimal coordinates
Return type:

bool
flattening_score()¶

Calculate quality of the flattening. The higher the worse. Ideally that should be 0.

Returns:Penalty score
Return type:float
has_bond_crossing()¶

Tells if the structure contains collisions

Returns:Indication about bond collisions
Return type:bool
has_degenerated_atom_positions(threshold)¶

Detects whether the structure has a pair or atoms closer to each other than threshold. This can detect structures which may need a template as they can be handled by RDKit correctly.

Parameters:threshold (float) – Bottom line to use for spatial search.
Returns:if such atomic pair is found
Return type:(bool)
class pdbeccdutils.utils.flattening.Mapping(atom_mapping, bond_mapping)¶
atom_mapping¶

Alias for field number 0

bond_mapping¶

Alias for field number 1

class pdbeccdutils.utils.pubchem_downloader.PubChemDownloader(components, pubchem_templates)¶

Toolkit to retrieve pubchem 2D depictions from the database

run()¶

Update 2d images of pdbechem components which are available in the pubchem database
